headline.main: U.S. SAYS NAZI SPY GOT 'SECRET' BOOK; FBI Instructions to Defense Industries Were to Co to Berlin, Court Is Told

lead_paragraph: Secret instructions issued by the Federal Bureau of Investigation to manufacturers in defense industries on how to combat espionage and sabotage within their plants found their way into the hands of an alleged German espionage agent, who earmarked them for transmission to Germany, it was disclosed yesterday at the Brooklyn espionage trial.
abstract: W G Sebold testifies L Waalen brought FBI secret instruction book on combating defense espionage and sabotage to FBI decoy radio station; book put in record; Sebold testifies Germans sent funds for Sperry bombsight purchase
snippet: Secret instructions issued by the Federal Bureau of Investigation to manufacturers in defense industries on how to combat espionage and sabotage within their plants found their way into the hands of an alleged German espionage agent, who earmarked...
